page.title: 15YOUTH RECREATION IN ALVA
page.content: Brownies,Guides,Cubs,Scouts and Boys Brigade are very popular in Alva, and hold weekly meetings. There are several Youth{Clubs.}Majorette training is held in the Cochrane Hall. There are several sessions for young people at the new Alva Academy swimming pool and disco's for different age groups are held every week. Playgroups are held for the under-fives every week day in the Dalmore Hall. In the summer holidays there is a playscheme for children aged 6 upwards. At the Woodland Park is a small obstacle course. Lots of people use the River Devon for{hobbies like fishing and canoeing. Part of the disused railway land at the west end of Alva is being landscaped as another{amenity}for Alva folk.
